DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Bucelipase Alfa ( BSSL ) Patients With Cystic Fibrosis Pancreatic Insufficiency
DOC.detailed_description: In open study , patient enter baseline period 6 day pancreatic enzyme therapy discontinue standard diet give . After baseline period , patient enter treatment period 6 day fix dose BSSL administer . The primary efficacy measurement make collect stool last three day period .
DOC.criteria: Patients cystic fibrosis pancreatic insufficiency able refrain ongoing pancreatic enzyme treatment period 7 day able produce stool > = 5 time per week
